root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 13-a-1, translated into en
root.data: 13.a Implement the commitment that the developed countries parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change have made to jointly mobilize from multiple sources $ 100 billion per year by 2020 to meet the needs developing countries with regard to concrete mitigation measures and the transparency of their implementation and make the Green Climate Fund fully operational by providing it as soon as possible with the necessary financial resources
